transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir, Ritu ke baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye haan.
Executive: Sir, woh aapka yeh issue hua tha problem buyleads vagerah mein jo aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm, lead lead nahi aa raha hai naam hamare.
Executive: Leads nahi aa rahe hai?
Customer: Haan. Matlab kaisa bhi nahi aa raha hai ya phir relevant nahi aa raha hai?
Executive: Nahi koi koi bhi lead nahi aa raha hai, relevant bhi nahi, kaunsa bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek second check kar lete hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, jaise ek lead aaya hai abhi brass coupling 25,500 piece Berur Rajasthan ka, hamare kaam ka nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aaya hai.
Executive: Lekin mere paas nahi aaya, woh IndiaMART se nahi dikha raha hai inko.
Executive: Sir, aapne kaunse number se apna account login kara hai?
Customer: Abhi aaj maine number badlaya hai usse, mera number dala hai 9975418873.
Executive: Nahi nahi, jab bhi aap apna login karoge na sir system pe ya mobile app mein, toh number dalega 89 wala jisme last mein 379 hai.
Executive: Jo sir ka number hai.
Customer: Last mein kitna?
Executive: 379.
Customer: 379, yahi number hai kya?
Executive: Toh abhi usko usko change karna padega toh.
Executive: Haan, matlab jaise ki dekho agar aap system se open karte ho na, toh system pe bhi aapko hai na yahi wala number dal kar ke login karna hai, OTP jayega tab OTP dal kar ke tab aapka start hoga. Kyunki aisa agar aap bol rahe ho mere paas nahi aa raha, toh ho sakta hai aapne kisi aur number se login kar liya hai.
Executive: Aur usme koi aapka dusra account login ho gaya aur jis vajah se aapko yeh buyleads nahi dikh rahi.
Customer: Woh mera profile mein jaake maine number
Executive: Ek baar kar ke dekho, acha system hai is samay aapke paas?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, system hai is samay aapke paas?
Customer: System?
Executive: System hai na is samay aapke paas?
Customer: Awaaz awaaz nahi aa raha hai aapka barabar.
Executive: Main aapko bol rahi hu aapke paas system hai laptop vagerah sab kuch hai?
Customer: Haan laptop laptop hai na.
Executive: Uspe uspe daliye s e double l e r dot indiamart dot com.
Customer: Seller?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Seller?
Executive: Haan, s e double l e r seller dot indiamart dot com.
Customer: Dot indiamart dot com.
Executive: Ek minute haan.
Customer: Haan aa gaya na?
Executive: Haan. Theek hai aap usme pehle wale mein primary number daliye sir ka jo maine aapko bataya.
Customer: Kidhar dalna hai yeh yeh?
Executive: Number dalne ke liye aa raha hoga na vaha par start selling vaise karke.
Customer: Export mein aa raha hai seller spot you need and they will be very.
Executive: Number dalne ke liye likha hai?
Customer: Nahi number dalne ke liye nahi aa raha hai idhar. Side pe a raha hai edit profile karke kuch aa raha hoga. New profile.
Customer: Profile hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Toh usme abhi mera profile hai.
Executive: Hmm. Abhi dikha raha hai number kaunsa dikha raha hai vaha pe aapka?
Customer: Abhi number mera 9975.
Executive: Vahi toh galat number hai na sir. Yeh wala number toh hai hi nahi. IndiaMART ka jo registered number hai sir ka, woh start hota hai 89 se last mein hai 379. Toh aapko yahi wale number se login karna hai tabhi aapko properly sir ke account pe woh aap access kar paoge United Tyres graph Private Limited ka.
Customer: Haan toh woh mujhe bataiye na update kaise karna padega number.
Executive: Aap usme vahi keh rahi hu teen dots pe profile pe ja kar ke neeche log out ka option aa raha hoga. Aap usse log out kar dijiye phir dobara se ek baar seller dot indiamart dot com pe jaiye. Vaha par number mangega aapka number daliye sir wala OTP aayega OTP dal kar ke phir start kariye.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai thank you.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants to update the registered mobile number.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the correct login process.

- Provided the correct registered mobile number.

- Guided to log out and log in again.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, login, profile, mobile number
